title: My Account has been transferred to another region/ Stolen
body: For some reason im still logged into this account on the website but i can't access my account due to it saying it has been transferred to another region. I put to much time into this game and it saddens me to see this happen to me. I hope someone from Riot reads this and decided to help me. Ive never given my account to anyone not even IRL friends that play league. Ive even tweeted to Riot Support but the last time they answered was 15 hours ago and said that would send a specialist soon. Im just posting on here to get some more eyes on the situation/ covering all the bases.

replies.body: We'd like to look into this and help you!  If you haven't already, reach out to us in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)  so our account team can review your specific issue.  In the meantime, it's important to go over the account [protection guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)to secure your information in and outside of the game.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can!
I already sent out a ticket like 20 to 24 hours ago. And even tweeted to Riot Support and said they would send a specialist soon but i haven't received a response yet :(
